DOC.brief_title: Text-message Program Reduce Risky Sexual Behavior Young Adult Female Emergency Department ( ED ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1825 year AUDITC score > 2 ( Drugs alcohol prior last sex OR No condom last sex OR > 1 partner last 3 month ) No personal cell phone SMS feature Prisoner Pregnant plan next 3 month Current past drug/alcohol treatment psychiatric treatment
